title: Correct typos in d3-axis documentation
body:
A few typos in the anchors for links in API.md:

"axisTight" -> "axisRight"
"axisTeft" -> "axisLeft"

title: Add CDNJS version badge in readme
body: This will add the badge to show its version on CDNJS and also link to its page on CDNJS!

title: Fixed typo in API reference
body: Duplicated utcFormat entries on API reference. Fixed wrong one.

title: Cross platform npm build modifications.
body: I have made modifications to package.json adding rimraf to dev dependencies and modifying rollup-node to work on Windows and hopefully be cross platform. I have not been able to test on Linux or OSX yet but it should work fine AFAICS.

title: Updated npmcdn.com links to unpkg.com
body: According to the [creator's twitter](https://twitter.com/mjackson/status/770427936449101824) and the [npmcdn's website](https://npmcdn.com/) the project was renamed to unpkg to avoid trademark issues.

title: Fixed description typo in API reference.
a few typos and clarifications in the changes doc
body:
Not sure if I fully understand these, but I sensed inconsistency
- enter nodes are not defined anywhere, but placeholders are mentioned
  everywhere
- catmull-rom changes described restoring the old behavior, but showed
  the new behavior
- sentence fragment when describing invert/rescale
- random fixes

(Just little stuff, but this is probably a document people will be reading again and again.)

title: fixed link typo in API reference
es6 import.
body: I spent almost 15mins figuring out how to import it.

title: Remove sentence fragment
body: Removes " There are also ." from the end of the paragraph on d3.hierarchy.

title: D3 slider
body: D3 min max slider is a d3 experiment for slider

title: Add link to first mention of d3.map
body: For consistency with the previous mention of d3.set, which is linked.

title: to be inspect -> to be inspected
body:
I was reading through this and it seemed like you meant "inspected" here:
- before: "...that also allows the axis tick arguments to be inspect."
- after: "...that also allows the axis tick arguments to be **inspected**".

title: Test
body: sorry, i did wrong,there is no thing

title: 添加map百度
body: 添加baidumap，增加部分控制界面

title: Added en_IN locale
body: Added English formatting followed in India.

title: chinese locale
body:
Changed the Chinese locale to make it closer to the Chinese custom and follow the [localeplanet rules](http://www.localeplanet.com/java/zh/). 
Added its corresponding test.
